verses.content: Jehosaphat chu a thlatuhai kuoma chun a in tah a; David khawpuiah a thlatuhai kuoma chun phûmin a um tah a; a naupa Jehoram chun ama aia chun ro a rêl tah a;
chun, unauhai, Jehosaphat nau- pasalhai a nei a: Azaria, Jehiel, Zekaria, Azaria, Mikael, Sephatia; hienghai po po hi Israel ram lal Jehosaphat naupasalhai an nih.

Chun, an pa chun an kuoma chun thilpêk nasatak elhai, tangka dâm, rângkachak dâm, thil hlutakhai dâm le Juda rama khawpui kul nei- hai leh a pêk a; amiruokchu, Jehoram chu nau lutîr a ni leiin lalram chu a pêk a.
Chuonga Jehoram chu a pa ram chunga chun a hung inlal a, a hung insukhrât phing chun a unauhai po po le Israel rama lal tamtak chu kâwlhnâmin a that tâwl tah a.
Rorêl a ṭan chun Jehoram chu kum sâwmthum pahni a na; Jerusa- lema chun kum riet sûng ro a rêl a.
Ama chun Ahab sûngkuoin an thaw ang khan, Israel ram lalhai lampuia bawk khan a feh a; Ahab naunu nuhmeiah a nei a; LALPA mithmua thil ṭha lo chu a thawh a.
Nisienlakhawm, LALPA chun David sûngkuo chu a sukbohmang nawh a, David kuoma thuthlung a lo siem ta lei le, ama le a thlahai kuoma khâwnvar pêk zing zing dinga a lo tiem ta leiin.
Ama hun laia chun Edom ram chu Judahai chunga chun an hel a, anni chunga chun lal an siem tah a.
Chun, Jehoram chu ama le a sakawr tawlailîr po pohai le a hotuhai le chun ân thawk a, zân lai a hang ṭhâwng a, sakawr tawlailîr hotuhai le ama inhuoltu Edom mihai chu a thaw tah a.
Chuongchun, vawisûn ni chen hin Edom mihai chu Judahai chunga chun an hel ta zing a; chu huna bawk chun Libna khuo khawm chu an lo hel veh a; a thlatuhai Pathien LALPA chu a lo nghatsan tâk leiin.
Chunawa khawm chun Juda ram tlângahai chun bâwlhmunhai a siem a, Jerusalema umhai chu ân uirettir a, chuongchun, Juda ram chu an lo ṭhuoi hmang tah a.

Chun, a kuoma chun zâwlnei Elija kuoma inthawkin lekha ziek a hung a, “I pu David Pathien LALPA chun hieng ang hin a ti a nih, ‘I pa Jehosaphat lampuihai chu i hraw nawh a, Juda ram lal Asa lampuihai khawm chu i hraw bawk nawh a;

Israel lalhai lampuihai chu i hraw lem a. Ahab sûngkuoin an lo thaw ta angin, Jerusalema umhai le Juda rama mihai chu i lo inuirettir tah a; chun, i pahnama mi i unauhai nanga nêka ṭha lemhai chu i that bawk a,
ngai ta, LALPA chun i mihai, i nauhai, i nuhmeihai le i thilnei po pohai chu hripuiin nasatakin a hrem ding a nih;
i phîng natna leiin nang khawma natna nasatak nei i ta; ni tin tinin, chu natna leia i rîlhai a suok zo vawng hmakhat chun nei i tih,’” tiin.
Chun, Ethiopia mihai kâwla um Arabia le Philistin mihai lungril chu Jehoram chunga chun LALPAIN a chawktho a;

Juda ram chu an hung rûn a, an hung lût a; lal ina thil hmua umhai po po an lâk vawng a; a naupasalhai le naunuhmeihai leh, chuongchun, a naupasalhai laia a naupang tak Jehoahaz ti chau naw chu a naupa- sal hrim hrim mâksanpêk a ni nawh a.
chun, hieng thilhai po po hnunga hin LALPA chun a phîngah natna dam thei loin a hrem a.

Chuong anga kum hni ân vawi hnung chun, a natna lei chun a rîl chu a suok a, natna natakin a thi tah a. Chun, a mihai chun a thlatuhai chawimawinaa meipui an sêm ang khan, ama ta dingin meichawk an siempêk nawh a.
Rorêl a ṭan chun kum sâwm- thum pahni mi a na, Jerusalema chun kum riet ro a rêl a; ama chu ngainatna um loin a thi tah a; David khawpuia chun an phûm a, lalhai thlân ina khan ni loin.
